value:
A battle cannot be won alone. So
many people support me that I can't
even count them all.$k$pI am grateful to every single one of
them. I must be.

In the past, humans and dragons
fought. But I believe it's always
possible to reach an understanding.

You look a bit grim, friend. We're all
here for you, so don't fret!

You can use magic, can you? My
teacher told me I'm not cut out
for it. Even so, I'd still like to try...

Just a little sword practice. I have
a lot to learn, so I feel a lot of
pressure to keep at it.

My name is Roy, and I've been
sent to greet you on behalf of
$Nf.

The battle continues! I must have the
strength to win it.

Not bad, but I can't let myself
become complacent.

No matter what befalls me, I must not
be disheartened!

Thank you for that. I can feel the
strength welling up within me.
I will do well in my next battle.

I am Roy, son of the Marquess of
Pherae. If you need help, I'll lend
you a hand. Together, we'll prevail!

Because I won the war against Bern,
people think of me as a great Hero.
I think of it a little differently...$k$pA truly great Hero is one who can
build a world where people can live
completely free of care.$k$pA Hero is wise as well. There's so
much to understand about the world,
the citizens, and even the dragons.$k$pIt's so much more complex than just
being good with a sword.$k$pComing to this world and getting to
speak with so many Heroes—and also
getting to know you—has inspired me.$k$pI want to learn even more from you.
We can work together to shape the
world. I'm counting on you!
はぁっ！
これからだ！
うああっ！
あきらめ…ないっ
Everyone's counting on me!
I refuse to lose!
How about this!
I will never back down!
Hope will never die…
ははは
A Hero celebrated in legends? You can't mean me.
Whuh? Sorry. I just cannot get used to that.
When war ends, that's when the real work begins.
The suffering of the people, and the lands that were devastated... I must put things right.
I bet you've saved a great number of worlds by now.
Let us bring forth a new era, together.
As long as we work together, we can save any world. That's what I think, anyway.
Sounds good.
I've got it.
I'm up!
